segments.text: How wonderful it is to be in love ! It's love at first sight ! Oh . he's my Romeo !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You look so happy . I see a twinkle in your eyes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , you have a crush on someone , don't you ? Maybe those are wedding bells in your eyes !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You certainly do like teasing me , Mary . Well I'm in love with someone . The question is , how do I get his attention ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , that's easy . Walk up to him and kiss him .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I guess I asked the wrong person .
segments.speaker: S1
